author: mcpierce
msg: NO-JIRA: Fixed the Perl sources portion of release.sh.
The script was trying to call make in a directory where there is no long
er a Makefile. Removed those pieces.

author: brett
msg: Previous change ensures it is correctly located in bin/NAME.dll as a file,
but the command line reference should just be the name as CSPACK will
determine whether it is in the subdirectory or not. Most projects will work
either way, but projects still using Hostable Web Core will fail if the
